Post_Metadata/caption:
Entertainment Tonight on Instagram: "Colleen Hoover says the legal battle between Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively has tainted how she feels about her novel, 'It Ends With Us.'⁠
⁠
"I can't even recommend it anymore. I feel like [the lawsuit] has overshadowed it," the author tells ELLE magazine. "I'm almost embarrassed to say I wrote it."⁠
⁠
"When people ask what I do, I'm just like, 'I'm a writer. Please don't ask me what I wrote.'"⁠
⁠
Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad."⁠
⁠
"This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell … but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."⁠
⁠
Swipe for more from Colleen and head to the link in bio 🔗 to read her full interview with ELLE.⁠
⁠
(📸: Getty Images, It Ends With Us)"
